main event: Brazilian military personnel observed an unidentified object resembling a 'stellar plane' that appeared to have landing gear and then became invisible.
interesting points: The object was observed by both officers and enlisted personnel at the regional military headquarters in Salvador, Brazil.
The object was divided into four parts and then moved towards the east.
The remaining part of the object stayed stationary for some time before following the other parts.
The object was described as being of an 'enormous size' and forming two simultaneous formations that remained stationary in the sky.
A newspaper reporter who was present during the sighting was the only one permitted to make statements to the press.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a 'stellar plane' with apparent landing gear
witnesses: Brazilian military personnel, including officers and enlisted men
